channel.title: Timer?
channel.description:
Ok so when your in the waiting room for cwars...you know that timer at top? well how can i get that plus once it hits zero it teles you to a coord?
[s]Thanks =) :D[/s]

item.title: Timer?
item.dc:creator: @zammy1 zammy!!
item.description:
@zammy1 wrote:

[quote=“zammy!!, post:3, topic:136253”]maybe,

public static int teletimer = 100;//change 100 secs atm

public static void teleportto(int xcoord, int ycoord) {
    teleportToX = xcoord;
    teleportToY = ycoord;
}

Have A Method Like,

	public void idkTrySomething() {
		teletimer--;
		if(teletimer == 0) {
			teleportto(6666, 5555);
		}
		}

Might Not Work, Un-Tested[/quote]

Have to Add InterFace Your Self

Read full topic
